settlement_method_pairwise_desc: Per-pair net. You pay only people you shared expenses with.
settlement_method_greedy_desc: Fewest transfers overall. You might pay someone you never shared with.
settlement_method_consolidated_desc: One transfer per person you owe, with expense breakdown.
settlement_method_treasurer_desc: Everyone pays or receives through one person.

settlement_freeze_description: Pause calculation so everyone can settle without changes. New expenses will be blocked.
add_expense_blocked_frozen: Settlement is frozen. Unfreeze in group settings to add expenses.

onboarding_participants_desc: Add friends or family who share expenses.
onboarding_expenses_desc: Log who paid what, with split types: Equal, Parts, or custom Amounts.
onboarding_balance_desc: See who owes whom; view You Owe and Owes You.
onboarding_settle_up_desc: Get suggested minimal transfers to clear balances.
onboarding_offline_desc: Work locally only. No account required.
onboarding_online_desc: Sync with cloud. Sign in required.

currency_change_warning: Changing the group currency will not convert existing expense amounts. New expenses will use the new currency.
onboarding_online_disclaimer: Online mode stores data in clear text on our servers. Do not store sensitive personal or financial information. We accept no liability for data loss or unauthorized access. Please back up your data regularly using the Export feature in Settings.
onboarding_privacy_agree_prefix: By continuing, you agree to our
privacy_policy_intro_body: Hisab ("we", "our", or "the app") is an open-source group expense splitting application. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our app. We are committed to transparency and respecting your privacy.
privacy_policy_permissions_body:
The app may request the following permissions. All are optional and requested only when you use the related feature.

• Camera — To scan receipts when you add an expense (tap the camera button). We do not record or store video; images are used only for receipt scanning and are processed on your device or via optional AI services you configure.

• Photos / Photo library — To let you choose receipt images from your gallery when adding an expense (tap the gallery option). We only access images you explicitly select.

• Notifications — To send you push notifications when group members add or edit expenses (Online mode only). You can disable this at any time in Settings > Privacy > Push Notifications. If you deny or disable notifications, the app works fully; you simply won’t receive push alerts.
privacy_policy_data_collection_body:
In Offline mode, all data stays on your device. No data is sent to any server.

In Online mode, we collect:
- Email address (for authentication)
- Display name and avatar (optional, set by you)
- Group names, participant names, and expense data you create
- Anonymous usage telemetry (if enabled in Settings)
privacy_policy_data_storage_body:
Offline mode: Data is stored locally on your device using SQLite. Nothing leaves your device.

Online mode: Data is stored in clear text on cloud servers powered by Supabase (PostgreSQL). Data is NOT end-to-end encrypted. Do not store sensitive personal, financial, or confidential information. We recommend backing up your data regularly using the Export feature in Settings.
privacy_policy_data_usage_body:
Your data is used solely to provide app functionality:
- Syncing expenses across your devices
- Managing group memberships and invites
- Calculating balances and settlements

We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data to any third party. We do not use your data for advertising or profiling.
privacy_policy_third_party_body:
The app may use the following third-party services:
- Supabase: Cloud database and authentication (when using Online mode)
- Google OAuth / GitHub OAuth: Sign-in authentication (optional)
- Gemini / OpenAI: Receipt scanning AI (optional, requires your own API key)

These services have their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review them.
privacy_policy_data_sharing_body: We do not share your data with third parties except as required to operate the services listed above. Group data is shared only with members of the same group. We may disclose data if required by law.
privacy_policy_data_security_body: We implement row-level security policies on our database to ensure users can only access their own data. However, data in Online mode is stored in clear text and is not end-to-end encrypted. We cannot guarantee absolute security. We accept no liability for data loss, breaches, or unauthorized access.
privacy_policy_user_rights_body:
You have the right to:
- Export all your data at any time (Settings > Data & Backup > Export)
- Delete all your data at any time (Settings > Advanced > Delete All Data)
- Delete your account by signing out and deleting your data
- Disable telemetry at any time (Settings > Privacy)
- Use the app entirely offline with no data collection
privacy_policy_data_retention_body: Your data is retained until you delete it. When you delete your data through the app, it is removed from our servers. We do not retain backups of deleted user data.
privacy_policy_children_body: This app is not directed at children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe a child has provided us with personal data, please contact us so we can delete it.
privacy_policy_changes_body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be reflected in app updates. We encourage you to review this policy periodically. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy_policy_contact_body: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please open an issue on our GitHub repository or contact the developer through the app's About section.
receipt_preview_web: Receipt image attached. Full preview is available in the mobile app.
